mapper.select: SELECT d.ID_, d.NAME_, COUNT(e.PROC_INST_ID_) INSTANCES_, (SELECT MAX(f.DURATION_) FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST f WHERE f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = d.ID_) MAXDURATION_, (SELECT MAX(tmp) FROM (SELECT PROC_DEF_ID_, COUNT(ACT_ID_) tmp FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST GROUP BY PROC_DEF_ID_, ACT_ID_) f WHERE f.PROC_DEF_ID_ = d.ID_) FREQUENCY_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION e JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF d ON e.PROC_DEF_ID_ = d.ID_ GROUP BY d.ID_
SELECT ACT_NAME_, COUNT(ACT_NAME_), AVG(DURATION_), MIN(DURATION_), MAX(DURATION_) FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST WHERE PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter} GROUP BY ACT_NAME_

SELECT a.NAME_, a.TYPE_, a.DOUBLE_, a.LONG_, a.TEXT_, a.TEXT2_, b.BYTES_ FROM ACT_RU_VARIABLE a LEFT JOIN ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY b ON a.BYTEARRAY_ID_ = b.ID_ WHERE (a.EXECUTION_ID_ = #{parameter.executionId} OR #{parameter.executionId} = '') AND (a.CASE_EXECUTION_ID_ = #{parameter.caseExecutionId} OR #{parameter.caseExecutionId} = '') AND (a.TASK_ID_ = #{parameter.taskId} OR #{parameter.taskId} = '')
SELECT DISTINCT a.NAME_ FROM ACT_RU_VARIABLE a JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION b ON a.EXECUTION_ID_ = b.ID_ WHERE b.PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter}
SELECT a.ID_, b.START_TIME_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION a JOIN ACT_HI_ACTINST b ON a.ID_ = b.EXECUTION_ID_ WHERE b.END_TIME_ IS NULL AND a.IS_ACTIVE_ = TRUE
CREATE TRIGGER aTrigger AFTER INSERT ON ACT_RU_EXECUTION FOR EACH ROW CALL "org.camunda.bpm.cockpit.plugin.sample.db.MyTrigger"
